rules_text:
[i]Inspired[/i] – Whenever this artifact becomes untapped, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a 1/1 white Rebel Soldier creature token.
{1}, {T}: Create a Gear token. [i](It's an artifact with “{1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Untap target nonland permanent. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
notes:
!addtoken Gear; Rebel Soldier;
!token Gear VRN; Rebel Soldier VRN;
